summary: An eye color replacer for all Mer races, Orcs included, derived from a texture from Oaristys' "The Witcher 3 Eyes"
descriptionHtml:
There really isn't much more to this than "I didn't like the elf eyes I had so I made new ones and thought other people might like them."

The original texture included in [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79622/?]Oaristys mod[/url] is called "Demon03." I simply edited multiple copies of it for color variation.

This isn't a fancy eye overhaul, just the basic .dds files. I recommend Mr. Dave's [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54416/?]eye normal map fix[/url] and reflections from [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes of Beauty[/url].

All credit goes to:

CD Projekt Red for The Witcher 3.
The Witcher 3 meshes and textures are owned and copyrighted by CD Projekt and used with explicit permission.
The Witcher is a trademark of CD Projekt. All rights reserved. http://www.cdprojekt.com

Oaristys, whose [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/79622/?]The Witcher 3 Eyes[/url] is amazing and inspired me to do this.
author: Miriam
